title: Spacious, affordable 2 bedroom apartments in Ypsilanti
posting_body: ['A Beautiful spacious 2 bedroom apartment in Ypsilanti is available.', "Enter into this two story building apartment you'll be greeted by the glamorous hallway with beautiful red carpet.", 'The recently upgrated apartment has an open living room, dining room and kitchen layout, great for all your needs.', 'It has two large bedrooms, one bathroom, walk in closets and washer and dryer in the building.', 'It is conveniently located just one mile east of East Michigan University, Washtenaw Community College and on the AATA Bus route in Ypsilanti, Michigan ((Bus stop is at our Apartments entrance).', 'It is also just 3 to 4 mils from Ann Arbor and the University of Michigan.', 'The rent starts from $915 including water (and hot water too), trash pick up.', 'Tenants only pay electricity.', 'Please call', 'show contact info', 'to schedule a tour.', 'Amenities include:', '.', 'Stove & Refrigerator', '.', 'Dishwasher available', '.', 'Air Conditioning', '.', 'Multizone Heating', '.', 'Laundry Facilities', '.', 'Smoke Alarm', '.', 'Fire Extinguisher', '.', 'At AATA Bus Line', '.', 'Top-Notch On-site Maintenance and Repairs Services', 'Please contact us at', 'show contact info', 'to schedule a tour of our beautiful apartment.', 'Prospective tenants are required to wear masks when come to our property.']
